criteria.name: Specificity & Precision
criteria.description: Each W/H element contains specific, measurable, observable information without vague language

criteria.name: Completeness
criteria.description: All 6 elements (What, When, Where, Who, Why, How) are thoroughly addressed

criteria.name: Clarity & Accessibility
criteria.description: Language is clear, jargon-free, understandable by cross-functional teams

criteria.name: Actionability
criteria.description: Analysis leads to concrete next steps and clear path forward

criteria.name: Factual Accuracy
criteria.description: No fabricated data; all statements grounded in user-provided facts

criteria.name: Strategic Alignment
criteria.description: Analysis aligns with project goals and organizational priorities from context

passing_message: 5W1H analysis meets quality standards for root cause investigation
failing_message: 5W1H analysis needs additional detail or clarification before proceeding
